title: Stephen.King.Pack.DVDRip (Part2) Halloween Movie Pack
description:
The Green Mile (1999)
Director: Frank Darabont
Cast: Tom Hanks, David Morse, Bonnie Hunt, Michael Clarke Duncan, James Cromwell...
Genre: Crime / Drama
Year of Production: 1999
Country: USA
Language: English / French
Runtime: 188 min

Plot: Paul Edgecomb is a slightly cynical veteran prison guard on Death row in the 1930&#039;s. His faith, and sanity, deteriorated by watching men live and die, Edgecomb is about to have a complete turn around in attitude. Enter John Coffey, He&#039;s eight feet tall. He has hands the size of waffle irons. He&#039;s been accused of the murder of two children... and he&#039;s afraid to sleep in a cell without a night-light. And Edgecomb, as well as the other prison guards - Brutus, a sympathetic guard, and Percy, a stuck up, perverse, and violent person, are in for a strange experience that involves intelligent mice, brutal executions, and the revelation about Coffey&#039;s innocence and his true identity...


The Dead Zone
Director: David Cronenberg
Cast: Christopher Walken, Brooke Adams, Tom Skerritt, Herbert Lom, Martin Sheen, 
Genre: Drama, Fantasy, Horror, Mystery, Thriller
Year of Production: 1983
Country: Canada, USA
Language: English
Runtime: 103 minutes

Plot: Teacher Johnny Smith gets in a horrible accident which forces him into a coma for five years. Once Johnny wakes up, he discovers he has the ability to read a person&#039;s life just by making physical contact with them. When the local police find out about Johnny&#039;s "powers", they bring him in on a murder case. Soon Johnny&#039;s abilities gets him into more trouble then he may be able to handle.


Silver Bullet
Director: Daniel Attias
Cast: Gary Busey, Everett McGill, Corey Haim, Megan Follows, Terry O&#039;Quinn, 
Genre: Adventure, Horror, Mystery
Year of Production: 1985
Country: USA
Language: English
Runtime: 95 minutes

Plot: The small town of Tarker&#039;s Mill was a place that was very peaceful, where nothing ever happened. Until one night, murders begin. The town people believe its some maniac killer on the loose and intend to hunt the man down. Marty, a young handicapped boy, believes that the killer is no man at all, but a werewolf. After a run in with the werewolf Marty and his sister, Jane hunt all over town for the man who is the werewolf.
Maximum Overdrive
Director: Stephen King
Cast: Emilio Estevez, Pat Hingle, Laura Harrington, Yeardley Smith
Genre: Horror, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Year of Production: 1986
Country: USA
Language: English
Runtime: 97 min
Subtitles: 

Plot: For 3 days in 1986, the earth passed through the tail of a mysterious comet. During that time, machines on earth suddenly come to life and terrorize their human creators. A small group of people in a truck stop, surrounded by "alive" semi-trailers, set out to stop the machines before the machines stop them.


Pet Sematary
Director: Mary Lambert
Cast: Dale Midkiff, Fred Gwynne, Denise Crosby, Brad Greenquist
Genre: Drama, Fantasy, Horror, Mystery, Thriller
Year of Production: 1989
Country: USA
Language: English
Runtime: 103 min
Subtitles: 

Plot: The Creeds have just moved to a new house in the countryside. Their house is perfect, except for two things: the semi-trailers that roar past on the narrow road, and the mysterious cemetary in the woods behind the house. The Creed&#039;s neighbours are reluctant to talk about the cemetary, and for good reason too.


Misery
Director: Rob Reiner
Cast: James Caan, Kathy Bates, Kathy Bates, Richard Farnsworth, Frances Sternhagen
Genre: Drama, Thriller, Horror
Year of Production: 1990
Country: USA
Language: English
Runtime: 107 min

Plot: Best-selling novelist Paul Sheldon (James Caan) is on his way home from his Colorado hideaway after completing his latest book,when he crashes his car in a freak blizzard. Paul is critically injured, but is rescued by former nurse Annie Wilkes (Kathy Bates), Paul&#039;s "number one fan", who takes Paul back to her remote house in the mountains (without bothering to tell anybody). Unfortunately for Paul, Annie is also a headcase. When she discovers that Paul has killed off the heroine in her favourite novels, her reaction leaves Paul shattered (literally)...


Stephen King&#039;s The Tommyknockers
Director: John Power
Cast: Jimmy Smits, Marg Helgenberger, John Ashton, Allyce Beasley, Robert Carradine, Joanna Cassidy, Traci Lords
Genre: Horror, Mystery, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Year of Production: 1993
Country: USA, New Zealand
Language: English
Runtime: 181/120  minutes
Subtitles: 

Plot: The small town of Haven becomes a hot-bed of inventions all run by a strange green power device. The whole town is digging something up in the woods, and only an alcoholic poet can unfathom the secret of the tommyknockers.


The Dark Half 
Director: George A. Romero
Cast: Timothy Hutton, Timothy Hutton, Michael Rooker, Julie Harris, Robert Joy, Beth Grant
Genre: Horror, Mystery
Year of Production: 1993
Country: USA
Language: English
Runtime: 122 minutes

Plot: When Thad Beaumont was a child, he had an operation to remove a tumour from his brain. during the operation, it was discovered that far from being a tumor, the growth was a twin brother of Thad&#039;s that never developed. Years later, Thad is a successful author, writing his serious books under his own name, and his pulp money-makers under the pseudonum "George Stark". When blackmailed by someone who has discovered his secret, Thad publically "buries" George Stark. From that point on, Thad increasingly becomes the prime suspect in a series of gruesome murders.


Stephen King&#039;s Thinner 
Director: Tom Holland
Cast: Robert John Burke, Joe Mantegna, Lucinda Jenney, Michael Constantine, Kari Wuhrer, Bethany Joy Galeotti, 
Genre: Horror, Thriller 
Year of Production: 1996
Country: USA
Language: English
Runtime: 92 minutes

Plot: A lawyer is cursed by a gypsy to lose weight...and lose weight...and lose weight...


Needful Things
Director: Fraser Clarke Heston
Cast: Max von Sydow, Bonnie Bedelia, Ed Harris, Amanda Plummer, J.T. Walsh
Genre: Crime, Drama, Horror, Thriller
Year of Production: 1993
Country: USA
Language: English
Runtime: 120 min
Subtitles: 

Plot: Leland Gaunt comes to Sheriff Alan Pangborn&#039;s pleasant little New England town, and opens a store. What this kindly Satan sells is whatever you need, from a surcease from pain to an object which you have always coveted. The Faustian price is, of course, corruption, and soon the poor sheriff&#039;s town is wracked by jealousy, spite, and violence.


Rose red
Director: Craig R. Baxley
Cast: Laura Kenny, Melanie Lynskey, Nancy Travis, Matt Ross, Emily Deschanel
Genre: Horror, Mystery, Thriller
Year of Production: 2002
Country: USA
Language: English
Runtime: 245 minutes (4 parts)

Plot: Dr. Joyce Reardon, a psychology professor, leads a team of psychics into the decrepit mansion known as Rose Red. Her efforts unleash the spirit of former owner Ellen Rimbauer and uncover the horrifying secrets of those who lived and died there.


Riding the Bullet 
Director: Mick Garris
Cast: Jonathan Jackson, David Arquette, Cliff Robertson, Barbara Hershey, Erika Christensen, Barry W. Levy,
Genre: Horror, Thriller
Year of Production: 2004
Country: USA, Germany, Canada
Language: English
Runtime: 98 minutes

Plot: A young man hitchhiking back home to visit his mother is picked up by a mysterious stranger. As the ride goes on, the young man uncovers a terrible secret about the stranger, and is given a choice by the stranger. A choice that can mean life or death. 


Secret Window
Director: David Koepp
Cast: Johnny Depp, John Turturro, Maria Bello, Timothy Hutton, Charles S. Dutton, Len Cariou
Genre: Drama, Horror, Mystery, Thriller
Year of Production: 2004
Country: USA
Language: English
Runtime: 96 minutes

Plot: Mort Rainey, a successful author, is passing through a hard period in his life. After catching his wife sleeping with another man, they separate and he moves away from the city to somewhere in the country. One day a man appears at his door, presenting himself as John Shooter, and accuses Mort of copying a story from him. Although Mort believes things can be solved once he shows Shooter the original version, which had appeared two years before Shooter&#039;s version, written in 1997, while Rainey&#039;s was published in early 1995. He can&#039;t seem to be able to get an original copy in the time limit set by Shooter. Strange things then start happening that prevent him from receiving the needed original, and Mort tries to find out who Shooter really is and if he is responsible for the things that have been happening.
